articles.author: zhangrui
articles.title: UK records highest daily increase in coronavirus cases - CCTV
articles.description: Another 55,892 people in Britain have tested positive for COVID-19, marking the highest daily increase in coronavirus cases since the pandemic began in the country, according to official figures released Thursday.
articles.content: LONDON, Dec. 31 -- Another 55,892 people in Britain have tested positive for COVID-19, marking the highest daily increase in coronavirus cases since the pandemic began in the country, according to of… [+2086 chars]

articles.title: Centre orders 83 crore syringes for COVID-19 vaccination; Nationwide dry run to begin tomorrow - All India Radio
articles.description: Government has ordered 83 crore syringes for COVID-19 vaccination drive and Universal Immunization Programme in the country. The Union Health Ministry said the centre has also invited bids for 35 crore more syringes.
